Happy Golden Anniversary to my 2 favoritest people in the World. 
Mrs. Sunil Shah and Mr. Ramesh Shah are the owners and my former employers of Salaam Bombay Restaurant in TriBeCa, NY. I always take my newly released books and seek their blessings before launching any big projects. 
My Gujurati parents, as I call them. 
I’m forever indebted, thankful and honored for all the opportunities they gave me. 
Congrats on your big day, many more to celebrate. ❤️

You will always be my hero who said, “Just remember, that you are my lion.” Happy Fathers Day. Everyday. .
.
Please read my life’s biggest lesson. 
On Jan 31, 2015, as a morning ritual I called home and to speak to my Mom and Dad. Dad was super excited for 2 reasons, Serena Williams was playing Finals for Australian Open and Mercedes had signed me up for their association. He told me that it was his dream to drive his son’s Merc. I laughingly said that why didn’t you tell me before, he joked and said “you had never asked.” We laughed as usual and disconnected.
At noon on the same day, he passed away. No child can ever be ready for this loss; it leaves a hole in your heart. Makes you feel empty, betrayed by Gods and unprotected to the World.
I still wonder about the line he said “you had never asked.”
So many times since that unfortunate day, I wish I could have done more for him, made him proud, and fulfill all his wishes.
Life lesson - Don’t wait for a single more moment. Our parents might never ask for anything and just give all their lives for us. 
Surprise them, spoil them, hug them, ask them about their dreams, and loveeee them. Because one day you might be able to buy a fleet of cars, but you cant buy time. 
Love You Papa. Miss You. ❤️

Almost 2 decades ago, I started working at The United Nations. I used to help my chef friends for dishwashing, cooking and service at the banquets. 
In 2006, I started my own catering company (more than 50 events, including Indian PM Modi’s Trillion Dollar Dinner and hosted several global dignitaries). ⁣⁣ On July 12th, at 6PM, my movie #TheLastColor will have a special screening at The 𝘜𝘯𝘪𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘕𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴 𝘏𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘲𝘶𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘴, NY hosted by 𝘚𝘰𝘤𝘪𝘦𝘵𝘺 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘰𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘯𝘥𝘪𝘢𝘯 𝘊𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘦 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘌𝘹𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘤𝘦. (SPICE- Indian Club) ⁣⁣
This is a miracle when your art is referred to as a "revolution" and people from 193 Countries are invited to celebrate it. ⁣⁣
𝘛𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘱𝘰𝘴𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘵𝘩𝘰𝘴𝘦 𝘱𝘦𝘰𝘱𝘭𝘦 𝘸𝘩𝘰 𝘧𝘦𝘦𝘭 𝘭𝘦𝘧𝘵𝘰𝘶𝘵 𝘰𝘳 𝘭𝘦𝘴𝘴. 𝘛𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘪𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘶𝘴; 𝘸𝘩𝘰 are 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘰𝘶𝘵𝘤𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘴 in many ways. 𝘞𝘦 𝘤𝘢𝘯 𝘥𝘰 𝘪𝘵, 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘳𝘦𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘴 𝘢 𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘮, 𝘱𝘢𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘪𝘵𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘮𝘰𝘴𝘵 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘵𝘭𝘺 𝘱𝘰𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘪𝘵𝘺. ⁣⁣

I’ve spent hours and hours at security checks in my life. 
A lot of the people at the International Airports would know me as MasterChef. 
But many times when they see my last name, they get confused. Yes, my last name is “Khanna” and it confuses and alerts security as they read “Khan.....na”. And on top of that I openly confess that “I have a Ma and also an Ammi” when they ask about my background. 
But it’s become so stereotypical in the last few years for additional “random” security checks. After a longgg check today they found (6 oz) Colgate toothpaste. 😂😂😂
I let it go. 
Life is such. Some days you win and on some you lose, but eventually life continues. 🙏🏼
.
.
Keep the toothpaste, but not letting go of that smile. 😊

#SacredFoodsOfIndia will be my 35th Book. 
The book is inspired by my Documentary Series - Holy Kitchens. 
It would reflect the true fabric and foundation of Mother India. 
The Foods that are for spiritual sustenance and for bringing the communities together. 
From Hindu’s Temples to Sikh’s Gurdwaras to Jain Temples to Jew’s Synagogues to Muslim’s Dargahs to Buddhist’s Monasteries to the Kitchens of Mother Theresas to Zoroastrian’s Fire Temples and much more. 
It will be a work of art, never witnessed before. ❤️
#JaiHo #CreatingMagic

And its a wrap. Recipe testing, food photography. Non-stop research. 24/7 Devotion. #SacredFoodsOfIndia
#CreatingMagic

I turned my meeting with @DalaiLama into a poem titled "SAIL" 
Hope you will like it..
.
- SAIL -
Remember the music, ignore the noise
There would always be another choice
To wake up is the greatest gift of all
Ignore fears and hear the inner call
Forget the number of times you fail
Persistence will teach you how to sail
Scars are the symbol of your survival
Move on! It’s your moment of revival

Yours truly.....VK
